akn:section.akn:heading: Duties and functions of Assistant Attorney General

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Specific, general and delegated powers The Assistant Attorney General shall—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Annual report to President and Congress

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Annual report to President and Congress The Assistant Attorney General shall submit an annual report to the President and to the Congress not later than March 31 of each year.
